main event: A UFO sighting involving a white, egg-shaped object reported on December 6, 1959, in Clarkston, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a grapefruit and four times brighter than city lights., The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 hours., The reported course of the object was from north to south., The conclusion suggests the object was probably a weather balloon., Observers included Mr. and Mrs. (name redacted), identified as a drug-store clerk and housewife.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. (name redacted), a drug-store clerk and housewife
